lord.translation[0].definitions[0].defin: a man who has a rank in the aristocracy, especially in Britain, or his title
lord.translation[0].definitions[1].defin: a man in medieval Europe who was very powerful and owned a lot of land
lord.translation[2].definitions[0].defin: a title of God or Jesus Christ, used when praying
lord.translation[2].definitions[0].examp: Thank you, Lord, for your blessings.
lord.translation[2].definitions[1].defin: God or Jesus Christ, used when talking about God
lord.translation[2].definitions[1].examp: The Lord helps and guides us.
lord.translation[2].definitions[2].defin: the title of someone who has a particular type of official job in Britain
